title: Holiday in the Vineyards
short_cast: Josh Swickard, Sol Rodríguez, Eileen Davidson, Omar Gooding, Carly Jibson, Annika Noelle, Carlos Solorzano, Julian Rangel
cast: Josh Swickard, Sol Rodríguez, Eileen Davidson, Omar Gooding, Carly Jibson, Annika Noelle, Carlos Solorzano, Julian Rangel

desc: While on a secret job for his mother's wine company, a man falls for the widow whose place he's renting. But will the truth spoil their yuletide romance?
